title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Sideboard", 1934–35
description: Curved bar (?)/unit on left wall, window above. Armchair to right, window above. Upholstered back and seat, legs slightly curved outward at top. Squared-off armrests extending from back to seat. Long rectangular sideboard on far wall. Sideboard slightly curved in shape of arch to conform to curve of wall. Three stacked drawers at center of sideboard; long horiztonal drawer pulls. Three small, square windows above sideboard, with circular shape in center of each window. Rectangular window on right wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Sideboard", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-308.
